official.headline: Guidance Assistants Expand
official.anchor_line: Stenograd welcomes the citywide launch of Predictive Guidance Assistants to help residents manage their records and daily compliance.
official.contextual_reframing: Early feedback shows lively engagement as citizens adjust, reflecting the system’s commitment to adaptive improvement and public reassurance.

underground.headline: Assistants Out of Control
underground.anchor_line: Stenograds new guidance bots are flooding the streets and confusing everyone with wild, contradictory warnings.
underground.contextual_reframing: Council promised peace of mind, but viral clips show assistants bickering and failing, while underground guides are filling in the real gaps.
